data.actual_result: Tooltip remains, allowing you to preform this sort of action.
data.expected_result: Tooltip should not remain upon entering the deletion modal.
data.short_description: Message tooltip remains when selecting the Delete option, allowing actions like editing a message in the deletion modal.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message and open the tooltip (three dots, not right-click). - Select Delete then select Edit as the tooltip should still be displayed.
